item.title: How to Stop Checking for Eye Floaters Constantly
item.description:
You didn’t plan to obsess over eye floaters.

But now, every time you pass a white wall, step outside, or open a bright screen — you check.
You scan. You search for the floaters. You try to “see if they’re still there.”

And of course… they are.

If you’re stuck in the cycle, here’s how to stop checking for eye floaters constantly — without fighting yourself or losing your mind.
